channel.title: HELP needed BIG time! - Setting currency in a store to a non-stackable item!
channel.description:
This is bugging me now, i've been trying to change the shop method carefully so you can use a non-stackable item instead of coins for a shop.
BTW i'm using Project Force source by Force I need an experienced coder here, I want to add in a function similar to buyItem called buyItemRock. So i want item ID: Rock (1480) to be used as currency in Shop ID: 17. This "Rock" item is Non-Stackable so i figure i need to delete the item by slot # not by Item Amount when i buy something.
in general, I need a way to have 1 specific shop use a non-stackable item to buy things in that store. Oh, and i'm manually setting the variable that defines how much the item's worth. If i set the item price in item.cfg, it sets the GP amount, i dun want that.. IM NOT DOING THIS FOR SELL, just buyItem only.
It can be c&p if it's allowed here but i mostly just want it done by my instruction. If you can't understand what i'm talking about here, just ask me for some more clarification.
I need help on this, whoever can may get free mod on my new future hamachi server and rep++, if u want.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2008, 05:05:51 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind, I figured it out. Lock please..
